EmailTemplate.name: Application submission
EmailTemplate.subject: We received your {!MUSW__License2__c.Credential_Type__c} license application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We received your {!MUSW__License2__c.Credential_Type__c} license application on {!MUSW__License2__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
Weâ€™ll review it and let you know if we need more information.
As soon as we approve your application we will issue your license.
Track your application status through our new online system:
Go to {!MUSW__License2__c.Portal_URL__c} Sign in or create an account and follow instructions.
Questions? Need help? {!MUSW__License2__c.Application_Type__c} {!MUSW__License2__c.Program_Email__c} {!MUSW__License2__c.Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov GEN001
